languages.text: "Женская особь, незначительно затронутая вуалью и обладающая примитивными представлениями о смерти. Я продемонстрировал ошибочность ее воззрений на прерывание бытия путем реанимации и небольших игр разума. Можешь забрать свою мон-кай... или сколько их там осталось — я все равно собирался утилизировать их".

"Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."
languages.original_text: "Женская особь, незначительно затронутая вуалью и обладающая примитивными представлениями о смерти. Я продемонстрировал ошибочность ее воззрений на прерывание бытия путем реанимации и небольших игр разума. Можешь забрать свою мон-кай... или сколько их там осталось — я все равно собирался утилизировать их".

traits.locale_text: "Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

"Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

"Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

"Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and subsequent cloning. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of the clones all the same."

"Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

"Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

languages.text: « Spécimen féminin, influence du voile négligeable, notions primitives de la mort. J'ai réfuté son point de vue sur la cessation de l'existence en recourant à la réanimation et à la manipulation mentale rudimentaire. Vous pouvez reprendre votre servante mon-keigh... et tous les autres exemplaires qui traînent. J'avais de toute façon l'intention de m'en débarrasser. »
languages.original_text: "Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

traits.locale_text: « Spécimen féminin, influence du voile négligeable, notions primitives de la mort. J'ai réfuté son point de vue sur la cessation de l'existence en recourant à la réanimation et à la manipulation mentale rudimentaire. Vous pouvez reprendre votre servante mon-keigh... et tous les autres exemplaires qui traînent. J'avais de toute façon l'intention de m'en débarrasser. »

« Spécimen féminin, influence du voile négligeable, notions primitives de la mort. J'ai réfuté son point de vue sur la cessation de l'existence en recourant à la réanimation, puis au clonage. Vous pouvez reprendre votre servante mon-keigh... et tous les autres exemplaires qui traînent. J'avais de toute façon l'intention de me débarrasser des clones. »

languages.text: «Espécimen hembra, influencia insignificante sobre el velo, nociones primitivas de la muerte. Demostré lo equivocado de su perspectiva sobre el fin de la existencia mediante reanimación y manipulación sencilla de la mente. Puedes llevarte a tu sirviente mon-keigh... a todas las que haya, pensaba deshacerme de ellas de todos modos».
languages.original_text: "Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

traits.locale_text: «Espécimen hembra, influencia insignificante sobre el velo, nociones primitivas de la muerte. Demostré lo equivocado de su perspectiva sobre el fin de la existencia mediante reanimación y manipulación sencilla de la mente. Puedes llevarte a tu sirviente mon-keigh... a todas las que haya, pensaba deshacerme de ellas de todos modos».

«Espécimen hembra, influencia insignificante sobre el velo, nociones primitivas de la muerte. Demostré lo equivocado de su perspectiva sobre el fin de la existencia mediante reanimación y posterior clonación. Puedes llevarte a tu sirviente mon-keigh... a todas las que haya, pensaba deshacerme de los clones de todos modos».

languages.text: 「女の被検体、ヴェールの影響はわずか、死に対する遅れた捉え方。私は蘇生とちょっとした精神操作によって、存在の停止に関する彼女の見解を否定したのだ。モン=ケイの従者を連れて行くがいい。残った人数はどれだけ連れて行っても構わない…どうせ連中は処分するつもりだったからな」
languages.original_text: "Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

traits.locale_text: 「女の被検体、ヴェールの影響はわずか、死に対する遅れた捉え方。私は蘇生とちょっとした精神操作によって、存在の停止に関する彼女の見解を否定したのだ。モン=ケイの従者を連れて行くがいい。残った人数はどれだけ連れて行っても構わない…どうせ連中は処分するつもりだったからな」
「女の被検体、ヴェールの影響はわずか、死に対する遅れた捉え方。私は蘇生してクローンを作ることで、生命の終わりという見方は間違いだと突きつけたのだ。モン＝ケイの従者を連れて行くがいい…残った人数はどれだけ連れて行っても構わない…どうせクローンは処分するつもりだったからな」

languages.text: “那是个女性样本，几乎没有受到面纱的影响，对待死亡的观念也非常原始。她以为死亡会让存在消失，但我却把她复活了。我通过非常简单的思维操纵手段纠正了她的看法。你可以把你那个猴子仆人带走……或者把那边剩下的人全带走。因为就算你不带走她们，我也打算把她们全都处理掉。”
languages.original_text: "Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

traits.locale_text: “那是个女性样本，几乎没有受到面纱的影响，对待死亡的观念也非常原始。她以为死亡会让存在消失，但我却把她复活了。我通过非常简单的思维操纵手段纠正了她的看法。你可以把你那个猴子仆人带走……或者把那边剩下的人全带走。因为就算你不带走她们，我也打算把她们全都处理掉。”
“那是个女性样本，几乎没有受到面纱的影响，对待死亡的观念也非常原始。她以为死亡会让存在消失，但我却通过复活与克隆的手段，纠正了她的看法。你可以把你那个猴子仆人带走……或者把那边剩下的人全带走。就算你不带走她们，我也打算把那些克隆人全都处理掉。

languages.text: "Weibliche Exemplare, unbedeutender Einfluss des Schleiers, primitive Vorstellungen des Todes. Ich habe ihre Ansichten hinsichtlich der Beendigung der Existenz durch die Wiederbelebung und simple Manipulation des Geistes verurteilt. Ihr könnt Eure Chem-Pan-Sey-Dienerin haben ... oder was noch von ihr übrig ist. Ich wollte sie ohnehin alle entsorgen."
languages.original_text: "Female specimen, negligible veil influence, primitive notions of death. I disproved her views on cessation of existence by way of reanimation and uncomplicated manipulation of the mind. You may take your mon-keigh servant... or however many of her are left in there — I intended to dispose of them all the same."

traits.locale_text: "Weibliche Exemplare, unbedeutender Einfluss des Schleiers, primitive Vorstellungen des Todes. Ich habe ihre Ansichten hinsichtlich der Beendigung der Existenz durch die Wiederbelebung und simple Manipulation des Geistes verurteilt. Ihr könnt Eure Chem-Pan-Sey-Dienerin haben ... oder was noch von ihr übrig ist. Ich wollte sie ohnehin alle entsorgen."

"Weibliches Exemplar, Einfluss des Schleiers vernachlässigbar, primitive Auffassung vom Tod. Ich habe ihre Ansichten über die Einstellung der Existenz durch Reanimation und Klonen widerlegt. Ihr könnt Eure Chem-Pan-Sey-Dienerin mitnehmen ... oder wie viele von ihr noch da drin sein mögen – ich wollte die Klone ohnehin entsorgen."
